|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' V3s @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A7) *Memory: 64MB (DDR2) integrated @360MHz *Onboard Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Wi-Fi: [[Realtek]] RTL8723BS (802.11bgn) *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 2.0 OTG ==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.sipeed.com/hardware/en/lichee/Zero/Zero.html ''Lichee Zero'' on '''SiPEED''' Wiki] *[http://linux-sunxi.org/LicheePi_Zero ''LicheePi Zero'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/licheepi/licheepi_zero_dock |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = sunxi |subtarget = cortexa7 |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== ===Models=== :;[https://wiki.sipeed.com/hardware/zh/ Hardware] *[[Lichee RV D1]] *[[Lichee RV Dock]] *[[Lichee Pi Nano]] *[[Lichee Pi Zero]] *[[Lichee Pi Zero (Gen 2)]] *[[Lichee Pi Zero Plus]] 
Model	Lichee RV D1	Lichee Pi Zero Plus	Lichee Pi Zero	 Lichee Pi Nano
SoC	Allwinner D1	Allwinner S3		Allwinner V3s	 Allwinner F1C100s
CPU	C906		ARM (Cortex-A7)		ARM (Cortex-A7)	 ARM (926EJS)
Freq	1.0GHz		1.2GHz			1.2GHz (max)	 600MHz (max)
RAM	512MB DDR3	128MB DDR3		64MB DRAM	 32MB DDR
Flash	SD NAND		SD NAND,SPI NOR,eMMC 	SPI SOP8 	 16MB NOR
